document.full_text: bahrain has asked formula one's governing body to reschedule its grand prix race when it meets friday, insisting the country is returning to normal despite ongoing political tensions for months.
document.title: bahrain hopes to hold f1 race this year
lines_and_colors: bahrain has asked formula one's governing body to reschedule its grand prix race when it meets friday, insisting the country is returning to normal despite ongoing political tensions for months.
